Title: AR and the (Possible) Return of Skeuomorphism
Description: Skeuomorphic graphical user interface emulates the aesthetics of physical objects (wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skeuomorph). Skeuomorphism was widely popular in UI design for computers, mobile phones and then smart watches for a long time. Probably the most famous example is Apple UI under Steve Jobs leadership. The purpose of skeuomorphism was to make interfaces ‚Äúaffordable‚Äù and easily understandable by users who didn‚Äôt have prior experience of interacting with new devices.
